relayCrossChainTrx(address,uint256,bytes.details: Must be called from IL2ToL2CrossDomainMessenger. Must check that the initial message sender is another instance of the same ICrossChainWallet.

params._calldata: Calldata to be passed to the transaction call.
params._dest: Address of the target contract to be called in the transaction.
params._prevMsgHashes: Array of message hashes on which the execution of the transaction depends.                          All messages with hashes on this array must be successfully relayed before                          this cross chain trs can be relayed.
params._value: ETH value associated with the transaction call.

params._prevMsgHashes: Array of message hashes on which the execution of the transaction depends.                          All messages with hashes on this array must be successfully relayed before                          this cross chain trs can be relayed.
params._tip: Amount of tip to be paid to relayer.
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token to pay tip.

params._calldata: Calldata to be passed to the transaction call.
params._chainId: Chain ID of the target chain where the transaction should be executed.
params._dest: Address of the target contract to be called in the transaction.
params._prevMsgHashes: Array of message hashes on which the execution of the transaction depends.                          All messages with hashes on this array must be successfully relayed before                          this cross chain trs can be relayed.
params._value: ETH value associated with the transaction call.

params._calldata: Calldata to be passed to the transaction call.
params._chainId: Chain ID of the target chain where the transaction should be executed.
params._dest: Address of the target contract to be called in the transaction.
params._tip: Amount of tip to be paid to relayer.
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token to pay tip.
params._value: ETH value associated with the transaction call.

crossDomainMessenger().notice: Getter to get L2ToL2CrossDomainMessenger instance that relays messages for this ICrossChainWallet.

relayCrossChainTrx(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Relays the message that was sent by another ICrossChainWallet. The relaying of the message should initiate a transaction call

relayTipRelayer(address,uint256,bytes32[.notice: Function to pay relayer tip after receiving corresponding cross chain message. Requires messages with given message hash to be succesfully relayed before.

sendCrossChainTrx(uint256,address,uint25.notice: Sends a cross chain transaction to be executed in another ICrossChainWallet deployed on a different chain. Emits a cross chain message that executes the transaction on the other chain once relayed. Relaying of the sent message can depend on other cross-chain messages being successfully relayed before.

sendCrossChainTrxWithTip(uint256,address.notice: Sends a cross chain transaction together with a tip for relayer. The tip is paid by sender on the sending chain and received by relayer on the receiving chain. Tip can be paid in any ERC20 token, however token address must be the same on sending and receiving chains. Relayer can claim the tip only after the executing transaction is successfully relayed.
